title: Why Pro Cyclists Come Back from Broken Collarbones Faster than You
content:
Egan Bernal was training on open roads less than a week after he fractured his clavicle at Clásica Jaén. Here's how pros are returning to the bike so fast.

Read the full article at Why Pro Cyclists Come Back from Broken Collarbones Faster than You on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
